comment: Alternate definition of the class of cosets by ` R ` : ` x ` and ` y ` are cosets by ` R ` iff there exists a set ` u ` such that both ` x ` and ` y ` are are elements of the ` R ` -coset of ` u ` (see also the comment of ~ dfec2 ). ` R ` is usually a relation. (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 16-Jan-2018.)
